mapper.select: SELECT c.challenge_id AS challengeId, c.title, c.description, DATE_FORMAT(c.starts_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS startDate, DATE_FORMAT(c.ends_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endDate, c.user_id AS userId FROM challenges c WHERE c.status != 'CLOSED' ORDER BY c.starts_at DESC

SELECT c.challenge_id AS challengeId, c.title, c.description, c.starts_at AS startDate, c.ends_at AS endDate, COALESCE(COUNT(cp.challenge_id), 0) AS participantCount, -- 참여자 수 CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM challenge_participants cp WHERE cp.challenge_id = c.challenge_id AND cp.user_id = #{userId} ) THEN true ELSE false END AS isJoined -- 사용자 참여 여부 FROM challenges c LEFT JOIN challenge_participants cp ON cp.challenge_id = c.challenge_id WHERE c.challenge_id = #{challengeId} GROUP BY c.challenge_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenges (title, description, budget_limit, period_days, starts_at, ends_at, status, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{budgetLimit}, #{periodDays}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'UPCOMING', #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE challenges SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, starts_at = #{startDate}, ends_at = #{endDate}, period_days = #{periodDays}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId}
UPDATE challenges SET status = 'CLOSED', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId}
mapper.select: SELECT challenge_id FROM challenges WHERE ends_at <= #{currentTime} AND status != 'CLOSED'
mapper.update: UPDATE challenges SET status = CASE WHEN starts_at > #{currentTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} THEN 'UPCOMING' WHEN ends_at < #{currentTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} THEN 'ENDED' ELSE 'ACTIVE' END WHERE status != 'CLOSED' -- 이미 종료된 챌린지는 제외
